titleStmt.title: Exile exiled Occasioned by a mandat from Rome, procured by Tho. Flemming alias Barnwell, archb. of Dublin, and friar of the Order of S. Francis, from the Congregation of Cardinalls De propagandâ fide, for the banishment of Paul Harris out of the Diocesse of Dublin. By Paul Harris Priest.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Paul, 1573-1635?

notesStmt.note: Place and name of publisher from STC.
Includes letters relating to the excommunication of Peter Caddell and Harris.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
